alert.note: Alert for Madison (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 07 at 4:47PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Madison Parish, Warren, southeastern Issaquena and southern Sharkey Counties through 545 PM CDT... At 446 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Fitler to near Yokena. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Vicksburg, Yokena and Le Tourneau around 500 PM CDT. Onward around 505 PM CDT. Valley Park around 510 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Delta. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
